title: Diabetic spicy baked beans with sausage and smoked bacon
ingredients: ['1 to 2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1/2 teaspoons celery salt', '1 teaspoon piri piri seasoning', '1 knob butter', '1/2 to 1 red onion, finely chopped', '3 to 4 mushroooms, sliced', '1 to 2 teaspoons chopped fresh dill', '1 teaspoon nam pla (fish sauce)', '1 teaspoon white balsamic or cider vinegar', '1 to 2 teaspoons diabetic sugar (e.g. Xylitol® or Canderel®)', '1 teaspoon smoked paprika', '1 (500g) tin borlotti beans', '1 (500g) tin tomatoes', '2 Cumberland sausages', '4 to 6 rashers smoked bacon', 'grated cheese (optional)']
